job.title: Sr. Software Developer (.NET)
job.description: Headquartered in Arizona we are a leading irrigation product development company that caters to residential and commercial customers all over the world Currently we are looking to expand our team in San Diego CA and are looking for a strong Sr Software Engineer with experience in NET C ASPNET MVC WinForms and Web DevelopmentltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Will Be DoingltbrgtltulgtltligtThe Senior Software Engineer will be responsible for the design and implementation of a multiuser Webbased software productltligtltligtDesign of software for central control of networked irrigation systems in geographically diverse areasltligtltligtDesign and development of advanced irrigation control algorithms and methodsltligtltligtDevelopment of virtualized cloud systems for centralizing control of multiple irrigation sites located around the worldltligtltligtDevelopment of both cloudbased systems and customer hosted systems using Windows IISltligtltligtDevelopment of NET business objects to fulfill product requirements and Unit Tests to validate the business logicltligtltligtWork with the Quality Assurance group to identify and fix defectsltbrgtltligtltulgtWhat You Need for this PositionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtMustHave SkillsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBSCS BSEE or equivalent from an accredited universityltligtltligtProficient with C NET ASPNET MVC
